Sentece: The AUC ratios between CSF and plasma for hydroxyzine after intranasal and intra-arterial administration were 4.0 and 0.4, respectively.
Title: Distribution of antihistamines into the CSF following intranasal delivery.

Sentece: Several compounds exhibited EC50 values below 10 nM against HCV infection, cytotoxicity selectivity indices above 2000, and showed improved in vivo pharmacokinetic properties.
Title: Discovery, Optimization, and Characterization of Novel Chlorcyclizine Derivatives for the Treatment of Hepatitis C Virus Infection.
